nodes.text: Rass Ordo was a male Human of Clan Ordo during the Third Galactic War. He was the brother of Jekiah Ordo and Layla Ordo.
In 3626 BBY, Mandalore the Avenger ordered Rass to accompany the Alliance Commander aboard the Spirit of Vengeance II in order to stop an attack by Clan Varad, the Dar'manda, and the Ash'ad.

After Rass and the Commander fought their way to the bridge of the Spirit of Vengeance II, they found Heta Kol, who they engaged in combat. Upon her defeat, Kol called a retreat, but only after learning that her followers had captured the banner of Clan Cadera.
